name: An aqueous mixture of catalase
glycerol
sodium citrate dihydrate
2-benzisothiazolin-3-one
FoodContactSubstance: An aqueous mixture of catalase (CAS Reg. No. 9001-05-2), glycerol (CAS Reg. No. 56-81-5), sodium citrate dihydrate (CAS Reg. No. 6132-04-3), sodium formate (CAS Reg. No.114-53-7), and 1,2-benzisothiazolin-3-one (CAS Reg. No. 2634-33-5).
